original_text: the priest is to examine the spot, and if the hair in it has turned white, and it appears to be more than skin deep, it is a defiling disease that has broken out in the burn. The priest shall pronounce them unclean; it is a defiling skin disease.
korean_text: 제사장은 진찰할지니 그 색점의 털이 희고 그 자리가 피부보다 우묵하면 이는 화상에서 생긴 나병인즉 제사장이 그를 부정하다 할 것은 나병의 환부가 됨이니라

sentences.original_text: the priest is to examine the spot
and if the hair in it has turned white
and it appears to be more than skin deep
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 피부 깊이보다 더 깊어 보인다면

sentences.original_text: that has broken out in the burn
The priest shall pronounce them unclean
it is a defiling skin disease
